burst.msg_body: Multiple burst reads of variable length and bit width 512 in loop 'COMPUTE_LOOP' has been inferred on bundle 'x_array'. These burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation, based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.
